*div1 type="summary"* *p*James Hope to Austin, July 17, 1826. Trade, currency, and Indians.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"* *p**date_mentioned n="07-17-1826">17 July. 1826*/date_mentioned**/p* *p*Dear sir*/p*
*p*I have sent my *person_mentioned*son */person_mentioned*and *person_mentioned*Capt. Chrisman*/person_mentioned* down to meet you and *person_mentioned*Mr- Castleman*/person_mentioned* at your office in respect of *person_mentioned*Mr- Castleman*/person_mentioned*'s Improvement I wish to leave it to yourself *person_mentioned*Capt. Chrisman*/person_mentioned* and *person_mentioned*Mr- Castleman*/person_mentioned* and whatever you agree on will satisfy me, paying him in cattle or any kind of Mirchandise that I have, I understood your *person_mentioned*Brother Brown*/person_mentioned* that you were wanting Beeves. I have two one of them Being a very Excellent one. If you can make any arrangement with *person_mentioned*castleman */person_mentioned*I will drive them down to you.—We are all arlarmed here on account of *person_mentioned*Indians */person_mentioned*and have moved down to *person_mentioned*Milicans*/person_mentioned*, But as yet we have seen no *person_mentioned*Indians*/person_mentioned*—I should take it a favour of *person_mentioned*Mr- Castleman*/person_mentioned*, as I am now on way down If I could at any leisure time I have be moving part of my Property on to the ground.—*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*James Hope*/person_mentioned*.*/p* *p**person_mentioned*Col. Stephen F. Austin.*/person_mentioned**/p* */div1*
